get.description: Get information of specified contracts that can be traded. This API will return a list of tradable contracts, including some key parameters of the contract such as the symbol name, tick size, mark price,etc.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Path Parameter. Symbol of the contract

code.description: 200000 is for success, other is error

symbol.description: Symbol

x-api-enum.name: FFWCSX
x-api-enum.description: Standardized swap contracts standard financial futures on swap, expiration swap funding rate

expireDate.description: Expiration date(millisecond). Null means it will never expire

settleDate.description: Settlement date(millisecond). Null indicates that automatic settlement is not supported

settleCurrency.description: Currency used to clear and settle the trades

multiplier.description: The basic unit of the contract API is lots. For the number of coins in each lot, please refer to the param multiplier. For example, for XBTUSDTM, multiplier=0.001, which corresponds to the value of each XBTUSDTM contract being 0.001 BTC. There is also a special case. All coin-swap contracts, such as each XBTUSDM contract, correspond to 1 USD.

isInverse.description: Whether it is a reverse contract

fairMethod.description: Fair price marking method, The Futures contract is null

fundingBaseSymbol.description: Ticker symbol of the based currency

fundingQuoteSymbol.description: Ticker symbol of the quote currency

sourceExchanges.description: The contract index price source exchange

fundingBaseSymbol1M.description: Base currency interest rate symbol(1 minute)

fundingQuoteSymbol1M.description: Quote currency interest rate symbol(1 minute)

post.description: Place order to the futures trading system, you can place two major types of orders: limit and market. Orders can only be placed if your account has sufficient funds. Once an order is placed, your funds will be put on hold for the duration of the order. The amount of funds on hold depends on the order type and parameters specified.

orderId.description: The unique order id generated by the trading system,which can be used later for further actions such as canceling the order.

post.x-sdk-method-description: Place order to the futures trading system, you can place two major types of orders: limit and market. Orders can only be placed if your account has sufficient funds. Once an order is placed, your funds will be put on hold for the duration of the order. The amount of funds on hold depends on the order type and parameters specified.

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, the maximum length cannot exceed 40, e.g. UUID, Only allows numbers, characters, underline(_), and separator(-)

side.description: specify if the order is to 'buy' or 'sell'

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

leverage.description: Used to calculate the margin to be frozen for the order. If you are to close the position, this parameter is not required.

type.description: specify if the order is an 'limit' order or 'market' order

remark.description: remark for the order, length cannot exceed 100 utf8 characters

stop.description: Either 'down' or 'up'.  If stop is used,parameter stopPrice and stopPriceType also need to be provieded.

x-api-enum.name: down
x-api-enum.description: Triggers when the price reaches or goes below the stopPrice.

x-api-enum.name: up
x-api-enum.description: Triggers when the price reaches or goes above the stopPrice

stopPriceType.description: Either 'TP', 'IP' or 'MP', Need to be defined if stop is specified.

x-api-enum.name: trade price
x-api-enum.description: TP for trade price, The last trade price is the last price at which an order was filled. This price can be found in the latest match message.

x-api-enum.name: mark price
x-api-enum.description: MP for mark price, The mark price can be obtained through relevant OPEN API for index services

x-api-enum.name: index price
x-api-enum.description: IP for index price, The index price can be obtained through relevant OPEN API for index services

stopPrice.description: Need to be defined if stop is specified.

reduceOnly.description: A mark to reduce the position size only. Set to false by default. Need to set the position size when reduceOnly is true. If set to true, only the orders reducing the position size will be executed. If the reduce-only order size exceeds the position size, the extra size will be canceled.

closeOrder.description: A mark to close the position. Set to false by default. If closeOrder is set to true, the system will close the position and the position size will become 0. Side, Size and Leverage fields can be left empty and the system will determine the side and size automatically.

forceHold.description: A mark to forcely hold the funds for an order, even though it's an order to reduce the position size. This helps the order stay on the order book and not get canceled when the position size changes. Set to false by default. The system will forcely freeze certain amount of funds for this order, including orders whose direction is opposite to the current positions. This feature is to ensure that the order wont be canceled by the matching engine in such a circumstance that not enough funds are frozen for the order.

stp.description: [Self Trade Prevention](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338146) is divided into these strategies: CN, CO, CB. Not supported DC at the moment.

x-api-enum.name: CN
x-api-enum.description: Cancel new, Cancel the new order

x-api-enum.name: CO
x-api-enum.description: Cancel old, Cancel the old order

marginMode.description: Margin mode: ISOLATED, CROSS, default: ISOLATED

price.description: Required for type is 'limit' order, indicating the operating price

size.description: **Choose one of size, qty, valueQty**, Order size (Lot), must be a positive integer. The quantity unit of coin-swap contracts is size(lot), and other units are not supported.

timeInForce.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, [Time in force](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338146) is a special strategy used during trading, default is GTC

x-api-enum.name: Good Till Canceled
x-api-enum.description: order remains open on the order book until canceled. This is the default type if the field is left empty.

x-api-enum.name: Immediate Or Cancel
x-api-enum.description: being matched or not, the remaining size of the order will be instantly canceled instead of entering the order book.

postOnly.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order,  post only flag, invalid when timeInForce is IOC. When postOnly is true, not allowed choose hidden or iceberg. The post-only flag ensures that the trader always pays the maker fee and provides liquidity to the order book. If any part of the order is going to pay taker fee, the order will be fully rejected.

hidden.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, orders not displaying in order book. When hidden chose, not allowed choose postOnly.

iceberg.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, Only visible portion of the order is displayed in the order book. When iceberg chose, not allowed choose postOnly.

visibleSize.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, The maximum visible size of an iceberg order. please place order in size (lots), The units of qty (base currency) and valueQty (value) are not supported.

qty.description: **Choose one of size, qty, valueQty**, Order size (Base currency) must be an integer multiple of the multiplier. The unit of the quantity of coin-swap is size(lot), which is not supported

valueQty.description: **Choose one of size, qty, valueQty**, Order size (Value), USDS-Swap correspond to USDT or USDC. The unit of the quantity of coin-swap is size(lot), which is not supported

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milisecond)

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: Current request page, The default currentPage is 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: pageSize, The default pageSize is 50, The maximum cannot exceed 1000

currentPage.description: Current request page, The default currentPage is 1

pageSize.description: pageSize, The default pageSize is 50, The maximum cannot exceed 1000

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

type.description: Order type, market order or limit order

stop.description: Stop order type (stop limit or stop market)

stopPriceType.description: Trigger price type of stop orders

stopTriggered.description: Mark to show whether the stop order is triggered

forceHold.description: A mark to forcely hold the funds for an order

closeOrder.description: A mark to close the position

visibleSize.description: Visible size of the iceberg order

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders

avgDealPrice.description: Average transaction price, forward contract average transaction price = sum (transaction value) / sum (transaction quantity), reverse contract average transaction price = sum (transaction quantity) / sum (transaction value). Transaction quantity = lots * multiplier

reduceOnly.description: A mark to reduce the position size only

leverage.description: Used to calculate the margin to be frozen for the order. If you are to close the position, this parameter is not required.

type.description: specify if the order is an 'limit' order or 'market' order

remark.description: remark for the order, length cannot exceed 100 utf8 characters

stop.description: Either 'down' or 'up'.  If stop is used,parameter stopPrice and stopPriceType also need to be provieded.

x-api-enum.name: down
x-api-enum.description: Triggers when the price reaches or goes below the stopPrice.

x-api-enum.name: up
x-api-enum.description: Triggers when the price reaches or goes above the stopPrice

stopPriceType.description: Either 'TP', 'IP' or 'MP', Need to be defined if stop is specified.

x-api-enum.name: trade price
x-api-enum.description: TP for trade price, The last trade price is the last price at which an order was filled. This price can be found in the latest match message.

x-api-enum.name: mark price
x-api-enum.description: MP for mark price, The mark price can be obtained through relevant OPEN API for index services

x-api-enum.name: index price
x-api-enum.description: IP for index price, The index price can be obtained through relevant OPEN API for index services

stopPrice.description: Need to be defined if stop is specified.

reduceOnly.description: A mark to reduce the position size only. Set to false by default. Need to set the position size when reduceOnly is true. If set to true, only the orders reducing the position size will be executed. If the reduce-only order size exceeds the position size, the extra size will be canceled.

closeOrder.description: A mark to close the position. Set to false by default. If closeOrder is set to true, the system will close the position and the position size will become 0. Side, Size and Leverage fields can be left empty and the system will determine the side and size automatically.

forceHold.description: A mark to forcely hold the funds for an order, even though it's an order to reduce the position size. This helps the order stay on the order book and not get canceled when the position size changes. Set to false by default. The system will forcely freeze certain amount of funds for this order, including orders whose direction is opposite to the current positions. This feature is to ensure that the order wont be canceled by the matching engine in such a circumstance that not enough funds are frozen for the order.

stp.description: [Self Trade Prevention](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338146) is divided into these strategies: CN, CO, CB. Not supported DC at the moment.

x-api-enum.name: CN
x-api-enum.description: Cancel new, Cancel the new order

x-api-enum.name: CO
x-api-enum.description: Cancel old, Cancel the old order

marginMode.description: Margin mode: ISOLATED, CROSS, default: ISOLATED

price.description: Required for type is 'limit' order, indicating the operating price

size.description: **Choose one of size, qty, valueQty**, Order size (Lot), must be a positive integer. The quantity unit of coin-swap contracts is size(lot), and other units are not supported.

timeInForce.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, [Time in force](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338146) is a special strategy used during trading, default is GTC

x-api-enum.name: Good Till Canceled
x-api-enum.description: order remains open on the order book until canceled. This is the default type if the field is left empty.

x-api-enum.name: Immediate Or Cancel
x-api-enum.description: being matched or not, the remaining size of the order will be instantly canceled instead of entering the order book.

postOnly.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order,  post only flag, invalid when timeInForce is IOC. When postOnly is true, not allowed choose hidden or iceberg. The post-only flag ensures that the trader always pays the maker fee and provides liquidity to the order book. If any part of the order is going to pay taker fee, the order will be fully rejected.

hidden.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, orders not displaying in order book. When hidden chose, not allowed choose postOnly.

iceberg.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, Only visible portion of the order is displayed in the order book. When iceberg chose, not allowed choose postOnly.

visibleSize.description: Optional for type is 'limit' order, The maximum visible size of an iceberg order. please place order in size (lots), The units of qty (base currency) and valueQty (value) are not supported.

qty.description: **Choose one of size, qty, valueQty**, Order size (Base currency) must be an integer multiple of the multiplier. The unit of the quantity of coin-swap is size(lot), which is not supported

valueQty.description: **Choose one of size, qty, valueQty**, Order size (Value), USDS-Swap correspond to USDT or USDC. The unit of the quantity of coin-swap is size(lot), which is not supported

post.description: Place multiple order to the futures trading system, you can place two major types of orders: limit and market. Orders can only be placed if your account has sufficient funds. Once an order is placed, your funds will be put on hold for the duration of the order. The amount of funds on hold depends on the order type and parameters specified. You can place up to 20 orders at one time, including limit orders, market orders, and stop orders  Please be noted that the system would hold the fees from the orders entered the orderbook in advance.

orderId.description: The unique order id generated by the trading system,which can be used later for further actions such as canceling the order.

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, the maximum length cannot exceed 40, e.g. UUID, Only allows numbers, characters, underline(_), and separator(-)

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

reduceOnly.description: A mark to reduce the position size only

get.description: Get the position details of a specified position.

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)

posInit.description: Inital margin Cross = opening value/cross leverage; isolated = accumulation of initial margin for each transaction

posMargin.description: Bankruptcy cost Cross = mark value * imr; Isolated = position margin (accumulation of initial margin, additional margin, generated funding fees, etc.)

liquidationPrice.description: Liquidation price For Cross Margin, you can refer to the liquidationPrice, and the liquidation is based on the risk rate.

bankruptPrice.description: Bankruptcy price For Cross Margin, you can refer to the bankruptPrice, and the liquidation is based on the risk rate.

settleCurrency.description: Currency used to clear and settle the trades

autoDeposit.description: Auto deposit margin or not **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

maintMarginReq.description: Maintenance margin requirement **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

riskLimit.description: Risk limit **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

realLeverage.description: Leverage of the order **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posCross.description: added margin **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posCrossMargin.description: Additional margin calls (automatic, manual, adjusted risk limits) **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posComm.description: Bankruptcy cost **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posCommCommon.description: Part of bankruptcy cost (positioning, add margin) **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posLoss.description: Funding fees paid out **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posFunding.description: The current remaining unsettled funding fee for the position **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posMaint.description: Maintenance margin **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

maintMargin.description: Position margin **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

maintainMargin.description: Maintenance margin rate **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
